long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Basic Formatting extension allows you to beautifully style any unstyled web page with the intent of making it easier to read. Simply install, and click the extension icon on any page you want to style. Refreshing the page will reset it back to normal. Works best on unstyled and lightly styled web pages.
